creator: grizolle_benedicte@emc.com
text:
Created attachment 22412
Contains JUnit test class and documents used for testing.

The text contained in a picture inserted in a word 2003 document is not extracted.
Note that the same issue appears with excel 2003, power point 2003, word 2007 and excel 2007 documents  (not tested with power point 2007 documents).


Find in attachments the JUnit test class and the document used for testing.
We expected to extract the word "agenda".

Notes on the attached documents:

- the document "classic_TextInPicture.doc" contains the words "agenda" in a picture inserted in the document.

"TestUnitPoi35Filter.java" is the JUnit class.

I think you'd need to extract out the image, then pass it off to an OCR program to get out the text. Not one for poi!

(We do however support giving you access to the pictures in all the file formats, so that bit is ok)
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
